// DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE. This file will be overwritten when re-running go-raml.
package main

import (
	"github.com/gorilla/mux"
	"net/http"
)

// FilesInterface is interface for /files root endpoint
type FilesInterface interface { // PathGet is the handler for GET /files/{path:*}
	PathGet(http.ResponseWriter, *http.Request)
}

// FilesInterfaceRoutes is routing for /files root endpoint
func FilesInterfaceRoutes(r *mux.Router, i FilesInterface) {
	r.HandleFunc("/files/{path:.*}", i.PathGet).Methods("GET")
}
